page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: Besides the main task of milking twice a day there are many other jobs that need attending to by the farmer. In the Sandbach area most farms employ only one skilled farm worker. During the winter months when the herd is kept indoors the cleaning and feeding is a further time consuming excercise.In summer this is less of a problem because the cattle can be turned out to graze. During the summer the most busy time for the farmer is when he is involved in the cutting of grass for silage.Between May and September there will be three cuts which will hopefully provide enough silage for the winter months. Other jobs include the growing of potatoes,small amounts of cereals and other fodder crops and the grazing of store lambs during the winter months.
